attributes.action: Apply to join the European Union Single Market
attributes.additional_details: While there was a referendum on the question of EU trade block membership in 2016, many things have changed since then. Critically, recent figures show that many voters have changed their minds https://www.statista.com/statistics/987347/brexit-opinion-poll/. Re-joining the single market would ultimately allow the UK to mitigate the cost of living crisis and foster future cooperation.
attributes.background: Rejoin the EU single market. This would fulfil the promise of being outside the European Union while promoting trade and cooperation across nations.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/604892
